name: Goals, Strategies, Objectives Document
description:
This is a simple goal, strategies, and objective document meant to be used as an artifact to document your approach or as a tool to facilitate workshops where teams explore and define the approach together.


This is a lot easier to use than post-it notes because I've set it up using Figma's auto layout feature. You can add as many strategies or objectives as you like...and be as descriptive as you need to be... and the layout will automatically adjust to your changes.


Be sure to check out my personas artifact that goes along with this as well. You can find it here:

https://www.figma.com/community/file/896430871266606440/Persona-and-Scenarios


If you want to see all this works together as a system that ties UX strategy to the tactical work in measurable ways. Have a look at my book:


From Chaos to Concept: A Team Oriented Approach to Designing World Class Products and Experiences

https://www.amazon.com/Chaos-Concept-Oriented-Designing-Experiences/dp/1119628962/ref=cm_cr_arp_d_product_top?ie=UTF8
